title: Spiekermann, Meta, PalmerWatson, MP3 on the Typographic Times
content:
The February issue of the Typographic Times is now available:

- interview of the type designer Erik Spiekermann  
 [http://www.planet-typography.com/news/designer/spiekermann.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013230159/http:/www.planet-typography.com/news/designer/spiekermann.html "http://www.planet-typography.com/news/designer/spiekermann.html")

- portrait of his FF Meta  
 [http://www.planet-typography.com/news/typeface/meta.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013230159/http:/www.planet-typography.com/news/typeface/meta.html "http://www.planet-typography.com/news/typeface/meta.html")

- interview of Ally Palmer, of the PalmerWatson newspapers designers agency  
 [http://www.planet-typography.com/news/typo/palmerwatson.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013230159/http:/www.planet-typography.com/news/typo/palmerwatson.html "http://www.planet-typography.com/news/typo/palmerwatson.html")

- a short history of typography in MP3 by Ken Botnick  
 [http://www.planet-typography.com/news/typo/mp3.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013230159/http:/www.planet-typography.com/news/typo/mp3.html "http://www.planet-typography.com/news/typo/mp3.html")

- a short interview about the Adobe strategy for type design  
 [http://www.planet-typography.com/news/typo/adobe.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013230159/http:/www.planet-typography.com/news/typo/adobe.html "http://www.planet-typography.com/news/typo/adobe.html")

The Typographic Times  
 [http://www.planet-typography.com/news](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013230159/http:/www.planet-typography.com/news "http://www.planet-typography.com/news")
author: Typook
